item.description:
A couple of members suggested we go back to Cavo's (Greek Restaurant). It was quite good, so I'd like to eat there again myself. They even have a gluten-free meal if anyone has that concern. Take a look at the website: http://cavostavern.co... Plenty of parking in the lot.

Weather permitting, I will be taking a walk around Walnut Hill Park in New Britain - 15 to 20 minutes from Cavo's, beforehand (5:30 to 6:30) if anyone wants to join me - answer this question with a "YES" after RSVP'ing and I'll send you more info. Or Email me "Betsy.meetup@Gmail.com"

Some Ethnic Dining "Rules":

1) If you RSVP "YES" you are expected to SHOW UP!!! Be polite and make sure you change your RSVP by 1:00pm March 30th if need be. If you have to cancel at the last minute call the restaurant to let them know.

2) Please bring cash, it is so much quicker and easier. Remember, no one leaves until the bill is paid - this is respect for the event's host and the other diners.

3) I will collect $1.00 from each participant for Meetup fees.

- Betsy

group.name: The Ethnic Dining Enthusiasts Meetup Group

item.name: Cavo's 6/16/10 7:00pm
